poi.name: Victoria Peak
poi.intro: Hong Kong's most famous viewpoint offering breathtaking panoramic views of the city skyline and Victoria Harbour.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central MTR + Peak Tram 25-30 minutes
poi.userComment: 💬 Amazing sunset views! Must visit at golden hour - absolutely breathtaking!

poi.name: Star Ferry
poi.intro: Historic ferry service providing scenic harbour crossing between Hong Kong Island and Kowloon.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central/Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 5-10 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Classic Hong Kong experience! Cheap way to see the harbour - very nostalgic!

poi.name: Avenue of Stars
poi.intro: Waterfront promenade celebrating Hong Kong's film industry with stunning harbour views.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 5-8 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Perfect for evening stroll! Great photo spots with harbour backdrop!

poi.name: Temple Street Night Market
poi.intro: Vibrant night market famous for street food, fortune telling, and local atmosphere.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Yau Ma Tei MTR 3-5 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Authentic local atmosphere! Great street food and unique shopping finds!

poi.name: Tsim Sha Tsui Promenade
poi.intro: Beautiful waterfront walkway perfect for evening strolls and harbour views.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR direct access
poi.userComment: 💬 Perfect for photos! Best harbour views in the city - especially beautiful at sunset!

poi.name: Wong Tai Sin Temple
poi.intro: Colorful Taoist temple famous for fortune-telling and wish fulfillment.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Wong Tai Sin MTR 2-3 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Very colorful and vibrant! Locals say wishes come true here - worth trying!

poi.name: Central District
poi.intro: Hong Kong's financial heart with modern skyscrapers and shopping centers.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central MTR direct access
poi.userComment: 💬 Impressive skyscrapers! Great for shopping and business district exploration!

poi.name: Ladies' Market
poi.intro: Bustling street market in Mong Kok perfect for bargain shopping and local snacks.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Mong Kok MTR 3-5 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Great for bargain hunting! Remember to negotiate prices - very lively atmosphere!

poi.name: Ocean Park
poi.intro: Marine-themed amusement park with thrilling rides and animal exhibits.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Admiralty MTR + Bus 629 30-40 minutes
poi.userComment: 💬 Fun for all ages! The cable car and roller coasters are amazing - full day needed!

poi.name: Hong Kong Disneyland
poi.intro: Magical Disney theme park with classic attractions and unique Hong Kong touches.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Disneyland Resort MTR direct line 45-60 minutes
poi.userComment: 💬 Magical experience! Smaller than other Disney parks but very well designed!

poi.name: Big Buddha (Tian Tan)
poi.intro: Majestic bronze Buddha statue on Lantau Island accessible by scenic cable car.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Tung Chung MTR + Ngong Ping Cable Car 45-60 minutes
poi.userComment: 💬 Peaceful and spiritual! The cable car ride offers stunning mountain views!

poi.name: Symphony of Lights
poi.intro: Spectacular multimedia light show illuminating Victoria Harbour's skyline nightly.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 5 minutes to waterfront
poi.userComment: 💬 Spectacular every night at 8pm! Best viewed from Tsim Sha Tsui promenade!

poi.name: Man Mo Temple
poi.intro: Historic temple dedicated to literature and war gods, famous for giant incense coils.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Sheung Wan MTR 10-15 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Atmospheric and mystical! The giant incense coils create amazing photos!

poi.name: Hong Kong Museum of History
poi.intro: Comprehensive museum showcasing Hong Kong's rich cultural and natural history.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 10-15 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Very informative! Great way to understand Hong Kong's fascinating history!

poi.name: Repulse Bay
poi.intro: Beautiful crescent-shaped beach popular for swimming and beachside dining.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central MTR + Bus 6/260 30-40 minutes
poi.userComment: 💬 Beautiful beach escape! Perfect for relaxing and swimming in the city!

poi.name: Stanley Market
poi.intro: Charming seaside market town perfect for shopping and waterfront dining.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central MTR + Bus 6/260 40-50 minutes
poi.userComment: 💬 Charming seaside atmosphere! Great for souvenirs and waterfront dining!

poi.name: IFC Mall
poi.intro: Upscale shopping mall in Central with luxury brands and harbour views.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central MTR direct access
poi.userComment: 💬 Luxury shopping paradise! Great harbour views from upper floors!

poi.name: Lan Kwai Fong
poi.intro: Famous nightlife district with bars, clubs, and international dining options.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Central MTR 5-10 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Vibrant nightlife scene! Great mix of locals and expats - party until late!

poi.name: Chi Lin Nunnery
poi.intro: Serene Buddhist complex featuring traditional wooden architecture and lotus ponds.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Diamond Hill MTR 5-8 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Peaceful oasis! Beautiful traditional architecture and serene gardens!

poi.name: Hong Kong Space Museum
poi.intro: Interactive science museum with planetarium shows and space exploration exhibits.
poi.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 5-8 minutes walk
poi.userComment: 💬 Great for kids and adults! The planetarium shows are mind-blowing!

food.name: Tim Ho Wan
food.intro: World's cheapest Michelin-starred restaurant famous for BBQ pork buns.
food.traffic: 🚇 Sham Shui Po MTR 5-10 minutes walk
food.userComment: 💬 Highly recommended! Worth the wait - BBQ pork buns are incredible!

food.name: Kam Wah Cafe
food.intro: Traditional cha chaan teng serving authentic Hong Kong-style breakfast and tea.
food.userComment: 💬 Authentic local experience! Pineapple buns with butter are amazing!

food.name: Lin Heung Lau
food.intro: Historic noodle shop famous for wonton noodles with fresh shrimp dumplings.
food.userComment: 💬 Traditional atmosphere! Fresh wontons and perfect noodle texture!

food.name: Yung Kee Restaurant
food.intro: Legendary Cantonese restaurant renowned for roast goose and traditional dishes.
food.userComment: 💬 Famous roast goose! Historic restaurant with excellent traditional flavors!

food.name: Sing Heung Yuen
food.intro: Iconic street-side stall serving tomato noodles and Hong Kong-style milk tea.
food.userComment: 💬 Unique tomato noodles! Street food at its best - very authentic experience!

food.name: Kau Kee Restaurant
food.intro: Famous for beef brisket noodles in rich, flavorful broth since 1920s.
food.userComment: 💬 Best beef brisket! Rich broth and tender meat - a Hong Kong classic!

food.name: Tai Cheong Bakery
food.intro: Historic bakery famous for egg tarts, once favored by the last governor.
food.userComment: 💬 Perfect egg tarts! Crispy pastry and smooth custard - must try!

food.name: Amis
food.intro: Traditional dim sum restaurant with classic pushcart service and harbor views.
food.userComment: 💬 Traditional dim sum! Pushcart service adds authentic charm!

food.name: Tsui Wah Restaurant
food.intro: Popular chain serving Hong Kong comfort food and crispy buns 24/7.
food.userComment: 💬 Great comfort food! Open 24/7 - perfect for late night cravings!

food.name: Australia Dairy Company
food.intro: No-frills cha chaan teng famous for scrambled eggs and steamed milk pudding.
food.userComment: 💬 Unique scrambled eggs! Fast service but worth the rushed atmosphere!

food.name: Lung King Heen
food.intro: Three Michelin-starred Cantonese restaurant with exquisite dim sum and harbour views.
food.userComment: 💬 Exceptional dining! Three Michelin stars well deserved - unforgettable experience!

food.name: Amber
food.intro: Two Michelin-starred French restaurant offering innovative cuisine and wine pairings.
food.userComment: 💬 Innovative French cuisine! Wine pairings are perfect - truly special occasion dining!

food.name: Caprice
food.intro: Three Michelin-starred French restaurant with classic techniques and elegant atmosphere.
food.userComment: 💬 Classic French excellence! Elegant atmosphere and impeccable service!

food.name: Harlan's
food.intro: Michelin-starred French restaurant with open kitchen and counter dining concept.
food.userComment: 💬 Interactive dining! Watching chefs work adds to the amazing experience!

food.name: Gaddi's
food.intro: Historic European fine dining restaurant with colonial charm and impeccable service.
food.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 5-8 minutes walk
food.userComment: 💬 Colonial elegance! Historic atmosphere with exceptional European cuisine!

food.name: Kam's Roast Goose
food.intro: Michelin-recommended restaurant specializing in perfectly roasted goose and char siu.
food.userComment: 💬 Perfect roast goose! Michelin quality at reasonable prices - locals' favorite!

food.name: Joy Hing Roasted Meat
food.intro: Local favorite for char siu and roasted meats with traditional Cantonese flavors.
food.userComment: 💬 Authentic char siu! Traditional flavors and great value for money!

food.name: Honolulu Coffee Shop
food.intro: Classic cha chaan teng chain serving Hong Kong-style coffee and comfort food.
food.userComment: 💬 Classic milk tea! Reliable chain with consistent quality and local atmosphere!

food.name: Flat Iron Burger
food.intro: Popular fast food chain offering affordable Hong Kong-style meals and set menus.
food.userComment: 💬 Good value meals! Quick service and affordable Hong Kong-style fast food!

food.name: Morton's of Chicago
food.intro: Authentic tea restaurant serving fusion of Western and Cantonese comfort food.
food.userComment: 💬 Fusion comfort food! Interesting mix of Western and Cantonese flavors!

hotel.name: The Peninsula Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Legendary luxury hotel with impeccable service, afternoon tea, and Rolls-Royce fleet.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 5-8 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Ultimate luxury! Rolls-Royce service and afternoon tea are legendary!

hotel.name: The Ritz-Carlton Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Sky-high luxury on floors 102-118 with breathtaking harbour and city views.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Sky-high luxury! Highest hotel in the world with incredible views!

hotel.name: Four Seasons Hotel Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Elegant harbourfront hotel with Michelin-starred dining and world-class spa.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Harbourfront elegance! Michelin dining and spa are world-class!

hotel.name: Mandarin Oriental Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Iconic luxury hotel in Central with legendary service and prime shopping location.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Iconic luxury! Perfect location for shopping and business!

hotel.name: InterContinental Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Waterfront luxury hotel with stunning harbour views and award-winning restaurants.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 8-12 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Stunning harbour views! Award-winning restaurants and prime waterfront location!

hotel.name: Grand Hyatt Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Contemporary luxury hotel in Wan Chai with spacious rooms and excellent facilities.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Spacious luxury! Excellent facilities and convenient Wan Chai location!

hotel.name: Conrad Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Modern luxury hotel in Admiralty with panoramic views and executive amenities.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Modern luxury! Panoramic city views and excellent executive services!

hotel.name: Island Shangri-La Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Elegant hotel with the world's largest Chinese silk painting and mountain views.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Artistic elegance! The silk painting is breathtaking and mountain views amazing!

hotel.name: JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Sophisticated business hotel in Admiralty with modern amenities and dining options.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Business excellence! Modern amenities and great dining options!

hotel.name: Empire Hotel Hong Kong－Wan Chai
hotel.intro: Classic European elegance in Tsim Sha Tsui with traditional afternoon tea service.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 8-12 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Classic elegance! Traditional afternoon tea service is delightful!

hotel.name: W Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Trendy design hotel in West Kowloon with vibrant nightlife and modern amenities.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Trendy and vibrant! Modern design and great nightlife scene!

hotel.name: The Upper House
hotel.intro: Minimalist luxury hotel in Admiralty with spacious rooms and serene atmosphere.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Minimalist perfection! Spacious rooms and incredibly serene atmosphere!

hotel.name: Cordis Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Contemporary hotel in Mong Kok with convenient shopping and dining access.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Great location! Perfect for shopping and exploring local dining scene!

hotel.name: Royal Plaza Hotel
hotel.intro: Comfortable hotel in Mong Kok with good value and convenient transportation links.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Good value! Convenient transportation and comfortable rooms!

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Modern hotel in Tsim Sha Tsui with harbour views and comprehensive facilities.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 10-15 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Solid choice! Good harbour views and comprehensive hotel facilities!

hotel.name: Marco Polo Hongkong Hotel
hotel.intro: Convenient hotel in Tsim Sha Tsui with easy access to shopping and attractions.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 8-12 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Very convenient! Easy access to shopping and major attractions!

hotel.name: Holiday Inn Golden Mile
hotel.intro: Reliable chain hotel in Tsim Sha Tsui with comfortable rooms and good location.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Tsim Sha Tsui MTR 10-15 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Reliable choice! Comfortable rooms and good Tsim Sha Tsui location!

hotel.name: Best Western Plus Hotel Hong Kong
hotel.intro: Budget-friendly hotel with modern amenities and convenient Kowloon location.
hotel.traffic: 🚇 Sham Shui Po MTR 8-12 minutes walk
hotel.userComment: 💬 Budget-friendly! Modern amenities at affordable prices!

hotel.name: Hopewell Hotel
hotel.intro: Compact budget hotel in Sheung Wan with efficient design and central location.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Compact but efficient! Great central location at budget prices!

hotel.name: New World Millennium Hong Kong Hotel
hotel.intro: Stylish budget hotel with smart room design and excellent Central location.
hotel.userComment: 💬 Smart design! Stylish budget option with excellent Central location!
